name: Paranormal Investigator (NetherbellGames)
description:
This is a prototype for a horror rpg with card-game elements. 

Take on investigations, research the unknown and delve deep into the horrors of the world.

Present in this prototype is the exploration stage and combat stage. Use cards every turn to gain resources such as Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence. Spend your resources on one action a turn that can deal damage, dodge attacks or study your enemy. Pick from 3 starting classes in the prototype that each have different skills and inventories, use the inventories to heal, deal damage or special effects depending on what you are fighting against.

Leave any feedback down below! I would love to know what works and what doesn't work and feel free to leave suggestions.
